#labels Featured,Installation
=Install XOT-Uzg as a plugin=
==Location of the plugins folder==
This assumes your Windows install drive is C:. Replace as necessary.
===Windows XP===
 * C:\Documents and Settings\[username]\Application Data\XBMC\plugins\music\
 * C:\Documents and Settings\[username]\Application Data\XBMC\plugins\pictures\
 * C:\Documents and Settings\[username]\Application Data\XBMC\plugins\programs\
 * C:\Documents and Settings\[username]\Application Data\XBMC\plugins\video\

===Windows Vista & Windows 7===
 * C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Roaming\XBMC\plugins\music\
 * C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Roaming\XBMC\plugins\pictures\
 * C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Roaming\XBMCplugins\programs\
 * C:\Users\[username]\AppData\Roaming\XBMC\plugins\video\

===Portable XBMC===
If you run xbmc in portable mode, use the following directories instead:
 * C:\Program Files\XBMC\plugins\music\
 * C:\Program Files\XBMC\plugins\pictures\
 * C:\Program Files\XBMC\plugins\programs\
 * C:\Program Files\XBMC\plugins\video\
